mapper.insert: insert into chick_member(memberId, memberPassword, memberName, memberZipCode, memberAddress, memberAddDetail, memberEmail, memberMobile) values (#{memberId}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberZipCode}, #{memberAddress}, #{memberAddDetail}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberMobile})
mapper.select: select * from chick_member where memberId=#{memberId} and memberPassword=#{memberPassword}
select * from chick_member where memberId NOT IN ("admin")
